mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_TEL, USER_CODE, SIGNUP_TYPE_ID, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{userCode}, 1, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_CODE, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_TEL, N.NICKNAME FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_CODE, NICKNAME FROM NICKNAME_LOG WHERE NICKNAME_LOG_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(NICKNAME_LOG_ID) FROM NICKNAME_LOG GROUP BY USER_CODE ) ) N ON U.USER_CODE = N.USER_CODE WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId} AND U.USER_PW = #{password}

SELECT U.USER_CODE, U.USER_ID, U.USER_PW, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_EMAIL, U.EMAIL_CONSENT, NVL(N.NICKNAME, '') AS CURRENT_NICKNAME, A.ZIPCODE, A.ADDRESS1, A.ADDRESS2 FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_CODE, NICKNAME FROM NICKNAME_LOG WHERE NICKNAME_LOG_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(NICKNAME_LOG_ID) FROM NICKNAME_LOG GROUP BY USER_CODE ) ) N ON U.USER_CODE = N.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ADDRESS_LOG WHERE (USER_CODE, LAST_UPDATED_DATE) IN ( SELECT USER_CODE, MAX(LAST_UPDATED_DATE) FROM ADDRESS_LOG GROUP BY USER_CODE ) ) A ON U.USER_CODE = A.USER_CODE WHERE U.USER_CODE = #{userCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS_LOG(ADDRESS_ID, USER_CODE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, LAST_UPDATED_DATE) VALUES(ADDRESS_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userCode}, #{zipCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT vwu.*, ui."게시물수" AS postCount, ui."댓글수" AS commentCount, ui."장비등록수" AS equipmentCount, ui."보유쿠폰수" AS couponCount, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VW_RENTAL_APPLICANT vra WHERE vra.USER_CODE = vwu.user_code AND vra.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('스토렌_매칭완료') AND vra.PAYMENT_STATUS IN ('결제대기', '결제완료') ) AS matched_payment_case_count FROM user_info ui JOIN VW_USER_WITH_POINT_TRUST vwu ON ui."회원코드" = vwu.user_code WHERE vwu.user_code = #{userCode}
